source_text: Should AuKing's future JV interest dilute below 10% the interest shall revert to a 1% Net Smelter Royalty (‘NSR').
additional_details: The royalty is received by AuKing Mining Limited if their Joint Venture interest in the Koongie Park project dilutes below 10%. It would be paid by the party holding the operating interest (likely Cobalt Blue Holdings Limited or a future operator).
